channel.title: Windows 7 64 bit Clicking Issue, Please help!
channel.description: I have a couple friends who have a windows 64bit computer and when they try to play my 317 server, and when they click twice they will get disconnected automatically. Help would be appreciated!

item.title: Windows 7 64 bit Clicking Issue, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:353400”][quote author=DivineSouls link=topic=449724.msg3299168#msg3299168 date=1281172043]
I have a couple friends who have a windows 64bit computer and when they try to play my 317 server, and when they click twice they will get disconnected automatically. Help would be appreciated!
[/quote]
This will sound odd, but it is a common fix for this issue. Tell them to uninstall the 64-bit have they have, and install 32-bit java.[/quote]

That is odd? I didn’t even know that a 64 bit computer could have a 32bit program on there? and have it work?

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 64 bit Clicking Issue, Please help!

item.title: Windows 7 64 bit Clicking Issue, Please help!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

DivineSouls:

I have a couple friends who have a windows 64bit computer and when they try to play my 317 server, and when they click twice they will get disconnected automatically. Help would be appreciated!

This will sound odd, but it is a common fix for this issue. Tell them to uninstall the 64-bit have they have, and install 32-bit java.

Read full topic
item.source: Windows 7 64 bit Clicking Issue, Please help!
